detaileddescription.para: Disable ECN marking for all colors
Enable ECN marking for green color. Yellow and red are disabled
Enable ECN marking for yellow color. Green and red are disabled
Enable ECN marking for red color. Green and yellow are disabled
Enable ECN marking for green and yellow colors. Red is disabled
Enable ECN marking for green and red colors. Yellow is disabled
Enable ECN marking for yellow and red colors. Green is disabled
Enable ECN marking for all colors
Range 1 - Max Buffer size.
Default to 0 i.e. maximum buffer size.

simplesect.title: Valid only when:
simplesect.para: @@validonly SAI_WRED_ATTR_GREEN_ENABLE == true or SAI_WRED_ATTR_ECN_MARK_MODE == SAI_ECN_MARK_MODE_GREEN or SAI_WRED_ATTR_ECN_MARK_MODE == SAI_ECN_MARK_MODE_GREEN_YELLOW or SAI_WRED_ATTR_ECN_MARK_MODE == SAI_ECN_MARK_MODE_GREEN_RED or SAI_WRED_ATTR_ECN_MARK_MODE == SAI_ECN_MARK_MODE_ALL

detaileddescription.para: Range 1 - Max Buffer size. Default to 0 i.e. maximum buffer size.

detaileddescription.para: Enable/disable ECN marking

briefdescription.para: Green minimum threshold bytes for ECT traffic. In absence of this attribute, green ECT traffic would use SAI_WRED_ATTR_GREEN_MIN_THRESHOLD value as min threshold.

detaileddescription.para: Valid when SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_ECN_ECT_THRESHOLD_ENABLE == true. Range 1 - Max Buffer size.
Default to 0 i.e. maximum buffer size.

simplesect.title: Valid only when:
simplesect.para: @@validonly SAI_WRED_ATTR_ECN_MARK_MODE == SAI_ECN_MARK_MODE_GREEN or SAI_WRED_ATTR_ECN_MARK_MODE == SAI_ECN_MARK_MODE_GREEN_YELLOW or SAI_WRED_ATTR_ECN_MARK_MODE == SAI_ECN_MARK_MODE_GREEN_RED or SAI_WRED_ATTR_ECN_MARK_MODE == SAI_ECN_MARK_MODE_ALL

briefdescription.para: Green maximum threshold for ECT traffic In absence of this attribute, green ECT traffic would use SAI_WRED_ATTR_GREEN_MAX_THRESHOLD value as max threshold.
